name: Anchor
flavor-text: The world is full of temptations.
drop-sources: In the Belly is a Beast Quest

name: Antique Greatbow
flavor-text: It'd be worth a hefty sum if it was never fired. What a pity.

name: Banshee Claw
drop-sources: Thy Bard, with a Vengeance Quest

name: Blazing Volley
flavor-text: Burn down the walls that bind you to this cage.

name: Blue Cake
flavor-text: I'm more of a brownie person, actually.

name: Boniface's Soul
flavor-text: Of course, there's always my way.

name: Carrouser
flavor-text: If you're not getting around, you're standing still.

name: Circuitous Gyre
flavor-text: Whirl. Whirl until you see yourself again.

name: Crossbolt Generator
flavor-text: Get this, it's a crossbow that fires more crossbows.

name: Eight Piece
flavor-text: You know I don't mean a word of it.

name: Envy
flavor-text: I see things in only two shades.

name: Frying Pan
flavor-text: I think I'm getting the hang of this!

name: Goblin's Bane
flavor-text: A perverse charisma fueled by avarice.

name: Kao Khan
flavor-text: He shaped the world with his hands.

name: Last Rites
flavor-text: But it's time for you to find it on your own.
drop-sources: Twenty Thousand Years Under the Sea Quest

name: LeChance's Last Leg
flavor-text: The other key to the monkey head.

name: Live Wire
flavor-text: The lightning. It's good for you!

name: Mage Staff
flavor-text: Power courses through the shaft as you touch it.

name: Merlin's Razor
flavor-text: It'll bite you in the end. Or the face.

name: Mistrial
drop-sources: The Trial of Crooked-Eye Phil Quest

name: Paladin's Sword
flavor-text: This is my House. I have to defend it.

name: Perceiver
flavor-text: How do you want to do this?

name: Portable Sawmill
flavor-text: Destroy nature and lumber futures on a budget!

name: Queen's Cry
flavor-text: Our enemies will come for us.

name: Rage Handle
flavor-text: Animals in a cage, some of us filled with rage.

name: Ragnarok
flavor-text: I really like the slime jellies.

name: Red Hellion
flavor-text: Think you're fast? Not fast enough.

name: Rogue Imp
flavor-text: It's a great day for an incineration!

name: Snake Stick
flavor-text: My new thing now is Snake Jazz.

name: Stab-O-Matic
flavor-text: A personal touch shows you care.

name: Storm Surge
flavor-text: Under the sea mermen feast on starfish soup, and all the starving men are crabs.

name: Sworderang
flavor-text: It's all coming back to you now.

name: Swordsplosion
flavor-text: Your sword is the sword that will pierce the heavens!

name: Throwable Hole
flavor-text: What happens if I throw a throwable hole into a portable hole?

name: Thunder Anima
flavor-text: We are the rising cascade, the rolling wave.

name: Twin Soul
flavor-text: A hero desires a sword, and a sword desires truth.

name: Twisted Delugeon
flavor-text: You're gonna need a bigger umbrella.
